adp_deploy_description: OVH Analytics Data Platform (ADP) contains all the tools to ingest, clean, process and visualize vast amounts data. We deploy a preconfigured and fully secured Apache Hadoop cluster, on top of OVH Public Cloud compute and storage resources. Then, simply upload your data or add data collector for real-time flows, and follow our documentation to make us of ADP benefits.
adp_deploy_cluster_name_help: Cluster name must contain between 3 and 15 characters, only letters are authorized.
adp_deploy_admin_email_help: Email is used to generate SSL certificates for this cluster and we will send an e-mail when cluster will be deployed
adp_deploy_admin_email_placeholder: Please enter the admin email to use
adp_deploy_public_cloud_project_placehol: Please select the public cloud project you want to deploy to
adp_deploy_public_cloud_project_help: You need a Public Cloud project to deploy an Analytics Data Platform.
adp_deploy_private_network_placeholder: Please select the vRack to use
adp_deploy_private_network_help: Private network (vRack) is not enabled in public cloud project '{{project_name}}'. A public cloud project with vRack is required to deploy an Analytics Data Platform.
adp_deploy_password_warning: Warning : OVH doesnâ€™t store your password. Please save it safely. If you lose it, you will be unable to access your cluster
adp_deploy_master_password_help: Your password must contain at least 1 number, 1 special character, and one uppercase letter. 12 characters minimum
adp_deploy_master_password_must_match: Password must match with the master password entered
adp_deploy_master_password_confirm_place: Please type your master password again
adp_deploy_ssh_key_placeholder: Please select the SSH keypair to use
adp_deploy_ssh_key_help: You need a SSH key to deploy an Analytics Data Platform.
adp_deploy_worker_nodes_help:
Nodes running jobs, providing compute capacity.

Storage capacity is directly related to workers.
adp_deploy_edge_nodes_help: Nodes hosting users home for services access
adp_deploy_master_nodes_help:
Nodes running the services coordination.

Amount and flavor are defined by OVH.
adp_deploy_utility_nodes_help:
Utility services : database, identity management, gateway.

Amount and flavor are defined by OVH.
adp_deploy_bastion_nodes_help:
Provides user access to Data Platform from public network.

Amount and flavor are defined by OVH.
adp_deploy_nodes_min_max: {{version}} supports a minimum of {{minNodes}} node(s) and a maximum of {{maxNodes}} node(s)
adp_deploy_flavor: {{ name }} ({{ cpuNumber }} CPU {{ ramCapacity }}Go RAM {{ diskCapacity }}Go Disque)
adp_deploy_nodes_quota_msg: Under your current quota, you can create up to a maximum of {{ instances }} nodes for the {{ region }} region.
adp_deploy_nodes_quota_exceeded: The available quota has been exceeded.
adp_deploy_review_info_header: The following cluster will be deployed
adp_deploy_review_info_details: We deploy with hourly billing by default. You will be able to switch to monthly billing directly in you public cloud project, after the cluster creation.
adp_deploy_storage_cluster_storage_helpt: Selected Analytics data platform '{{adp_version}}', supports minimum storage {{min_storage}}, and maximum storage {{max_storage}}
adp_deploy_quota_error_model_description: Public cloud project, {{cloud_name}}, does not meet required quota requirements to deploy Analytics Data Platform.
adp_deploy_quota_error_model_info: You can increase quota for the public cloud, {{cloud_name}}, or select different public cloud under 'General configuration' step.
adp_deploy_quota_min_servers_error: Minimun {{numberOfServers}} nodes are required to deploy Analytics Data Platform. Under your current quota, you can create up to a maximum of {{ instances }} nodes for the {{ region }} region.
adp_get_price_catalog_error: Failed to get public cloud price details: {{message}}
